arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c} {c_resource}{SF_2}{/c} seconds
Subo will call out an enemy target and mark them for {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds. Killing this enemy before the mark expires grants {c_number}[{SF_5}*100|1%|]{/c} of your maximum resource and reduces the next mark's cooldown by {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds.

{c_label}Passive:{/c} Subo reveals nearby enemies, traps and materials.
